title: Cottoni posthuma divers choice pieces of that renowned antiquary, Sir Robert Cotton, Knight and Baronet, preserved from the injury of time, and exposed to publick light, for the benefit of posterity / by J.H., Esq.
author: Cotton, Robert, Sir, 1571-1631.
publisher: Printed for Richard Lowndes ..., and Matthew Gilliflower ...,
notes: Consists of 16 pieces, each (except the first) have special t.p.
"The life and raign of Henry the Third," listed in the contents, is replaced by "The danger wherein this kingdome now standeth."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
